Description.Text: Location This hotel is situated in Reboredo, only 300 m from the beach and 3 km from O Grove, one of the most well-known tourist destinations in Galicia, and the famous Island of La Toja, a natural thermal spa centre connected to O Grove by a nineteenth-century bridge. The nearest airport is Vigo airport, 60 km away from the hotel. Facilities The hotel comprises a total of 69 rooms. Most of the storeys can be reached by lift. Services and facilities at the hotel include a safe, a restaurant, a breakfast room, a bar, a transfer service, a laundry service and a smoke alarm. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. There is also a garden. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the establishment. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area. Rooms Rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. The standard features of most rooms include a balcony. Extra beds can be requested. A safe and a desk are also available. Little extras, including internet access, a telephone, a TV, a plug adapter and WiFi, contribute to a great stay. The bathrooms are fitted with a shower and a bathtub. A hairdryer is also available. As a special feature, guests can enjoy cosmetic products and background music in the bathrooms. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool is an enjoyable way to cool down on hot days. A terrace, a sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. Leisure options at the accommodation include tennis, a gym and hydrotherapy applications, or for a fee, golf. Entertainment facilities include a casino. Meals Half board is bookable. Snacks and meals, including breakfast, lunch and dinner are available. Gluten-free meals and vegetarian dishes can be prepared on request. In addition, picnic and snacks are available.

Half board is bookable. Snacks and meals, including breakfast, lunch and dinner are available. Gluten-free meals and vegetarian dishes can be prepared on request. In addition, picnic and snacks are available.
